billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

title: Authorizes the sale of wine supplies
summary: Authorizes the sale of wine supplies and accessories, including any item utilized for the storage, transport, serving or consumption of wine or for decorative purposes whether sold as single items or combined into a package containing wine or a wine product.
currentCommittee: COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS
actClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to the sale of wine supplies and accessories
